page.title: 10A DAY IN MY LIFE OF A BOY
page.content: I woke up on a bed with a mattress and a blanket with sheets.I wore underwear,a jumper,trousers,trainers, and socks.I had breakfast which was, tea from a teabag,Weetabix from wheat and toast with jam on.We then drove to school and I read a computer manual.We sang songs at 9:45 till 10:15 they were good.We then did some English.The other children went out to play but I watched someone playing"DARE DEVIL DENNIS", on the computer.After play we started Mental Arithmetic,and after it was Leon's talk.After lunch,I played with the Infants.At 13:15 we did some Scope which is an English book.At 14:15 Mr.Powell talked about two musuems.This lasted till the end of school.Straight afterwards we played our cornets.A cornet is a thing which you blow down to make a noise,Oliver was playing"FROGGER",on the computer.
